forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early, then partly cloudy for the afternoon. High 14C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High 57F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear this evening then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 6C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear this evening then becoming cloudy after midnight. Low 42F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain developing later in the day. High 58F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Thunder possible. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clearing skies after some morning rain. High 13C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Clearing skies after some morning rain. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 7C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 44F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with light rain developing later in the day. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 52F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the evening, then becoming cloudy overnight. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low near 45F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High near 55F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 46F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 13C. E winds shifting to WNW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. E winds shifting to WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 9C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 47F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers. High 13C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with showers at times. High around 55F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low near 45F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 56F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 7C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. High 13C. Winds N at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. High around 55F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
